project_descr: Support to better coordination and management of international aid/assistance (through the establishment of the development assistance database- DAD)

outputs.output_descr: The Project “Support to better coordination and management of international aid/assistance” will assist the Government of Ukraine to install the Development Assistance Database (DAD), an on-line database system that provides access to real-time information on project financing, implementation and progress towards results. DAD allows quick generation of various reports, charts and maps displaying project-level information on foreign assistance by donor, sector and/or location at different levels of aggregation. Thereby, DAD Ukraine will contribute to better aid coordination, transparency, plann
